name: ROAD RACER (Andgameplay)
description:
ROAD RACER

Run on an extensive road at high speeds and dodge the traffic of cars in your path! Go far and make new records!

Game developed in the Coppercube engine without the use of codes!

This game has arcade gameplay and art style inspired in mobile games!

Game with day and night cycle, don't forget to turn on the headlight at night in this endless runner!

Controls

Use arrow keys to steer

Andgameplay 2022, by Andre Luis.

Contact: andrewqi_@hotmail.com
